attributes.action: Request the immediate dissolution of parliament and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses scandal and the response of the government to it demonstrates they are unfit to govern, allied to a Finance Bill that is manifestly inadequate to meet the challenges of the current economic climate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
